data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Phatthalung, Thailand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phatthalung, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 3,312 believers in Phatthalung to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary: On average, 44 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Phatthalung, Thailand.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Phatthalung, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Phatthalung, Thailand.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Han Chinese, Hakka people might believe through him.
Lord, to the people of Phatthalung you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Phatthalung to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary:
the state of Phatthalung, Thailand has a population of 512,200.

We estimate Phatthalung has 3,312 people who might know Jesus, 3,381 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 505,507 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Phatthalung, Thailand to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
